elements.text: You love to go hiking, but since being diagnosed with HD, you've felt uneasy about going alone. You message a friend about your concerns, and they don't respond immediately. After a few minutes, your friend responds that your desire to continue hiking is...

elements.name: Hiking Hiatus_Presymptomatic_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
